item.title: The Book of Esther 2
item.description: God, Guiding and Controlling his Purpose Behind the Scene Gleanings from the book of Esther Chapter 2 1.1 Practical Lessons from the book of Esther Esther chapter 1: 1— 9 1 Now in the days of Ahasuerus, the Ahasuerus who reigned from India to Ethiopia over 127 provinces, 2 in those days when King Ahasuerus sat on his royal throne in Susa, the capital,

item.title: The Book of Esther 1
item.description: God Guiding and Controlling his Purpose Behind the Scene Gleanings from the book of Esther Chapter 1 Within my reach is a compelling verse in Heb.11:3, ‘By faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the Word of God, so that the things which are seen were not made of things which are visible’.
